summary: A multi phobia-plagued single woman who hasn't left her apartment in six years finds her carefully organized existence disrupted by her hot new 'on-the-go' neighbor.
cast: Kristin Booth|Aaron Abrams|Shauna MacDonald|Ryan Blakely|Raoul Bhaneja|Jefferson Brown|Brandon Firla|Andrea McCulloch|Rosemary Dunsmore|Gordon Pinsent
title: At Home by Myself... with You
